pageContext._xxxcollectionTitlextxt: Radio Television News Directors Association Records
pageContext._xxxcollectionDescriptionxtxt: Includes correspondence, minutes of the board of directors, convention reports, financial records and committee and membership files. Also includes copies of the organization's publications such as the "Commentator" and "RTNDA Bulletin." Correspondents include Edward R. Murrow. As of 2005, much of the collection remains in a semi­processed and/or unprocessed state although there is an online finding aid.
